scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:contract:messages && npm run pact:publish && npm run test:contract:provider
scripts.test:contract:provider: sh -c 'PACT_PROVIDER_APP_VERSION=${PACT_PROVIDER_APP_VERSION:-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)} PACT_CONTRACT_BRANCH=${PACT_CONTRACT_BRANCH:-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)} vitest run --globals test/contracts/provider'
scripts.pact:publish: sh -c 'VERSION=${PACT_CONSUMER_APP_VERSION:-${PACT_PROVIDER_APP_VERSION:-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)}}; BRANCH=${PACT_CONTRACT_BRANCH:-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)}; npx pact-broker publish ./pacts --broker-base-url ${PACT_BROKER_BASE_URL:-http://localhost:9292} --consumer-app-version ${VERSION} --branch ${BRANCH} --tag ${PACT_CONTRACT_TAG:-dev}'
